History.Description: EasyUaSubscription and EasyUaSubscriptionList FUBs improved disabling performance.

History.Author: Javier Novella
History.Description: Improved disconnection procedure for EasyUaWrite, EasyUaWriteList, EasyUaRead, EasyUaReadList, EasyUaMethodCall. Improved backwards compatibility with old AR. Updated minimum versions.
